posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Hello, ECBers.

I was just wondering, since the guild has been remade and we are again posting new fresh off the oven builds and our lvl 40 builds section already has two pages, if now wouldn't be the time to start thinking of a way to have our own search engine, customized for this guild's format with lvl 20, lvl 30 and lvl 40 builds as "seach categories" of some sort to make the search easier. I know nothing about how one would do such a thing, but I thought maybe if I raise the issue, we may find someone that can do it, eh?

Gotta go now, cya!

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content: We could ask The_Krit. Possibly bribe him too

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
KailPendragon wrote:We could ask The_Krit. Possibly bribe him too
Sure, you go ahead and do that as you know him way better than I. If bribery is in order, send me the bill (or my percentage) and I'll contribute .
